FuncDef: This command enables the context to configure digital signal level 1 (DS-1) frame parameters. The T-Carrier system was the first successful system that supported digitized voice transmission. The original transmission rate (1.544 Mb/s) in the T-1 (DS-1) line is commonly used by Internet service providers (ISPs) to connect to the Internet.

ParaDef.Info: Identifies the DS-1 channel being created. Values-DS1: 1 to 28, ds1-sonet-sdh-index.
